original_text: The time for Uriah's wife to weep for her husband came to an end. Then David sent some of his men to bring her to his palace. She became David's wife. Later, she gave birth to a son. But the Lord was not pleased with David because of the bad things that David had done.
korean_text: 그 장례를 마치매 다윗이 사람을 보내 그를 왕궁으로 데려오니 그가 그의 아내가 되어 그에게 아들을 낳으니라 다윗이 행한 그 일이 여호와 보시기에 악하였더라

sentences.original_text: The time for Uriah's wife to weep
for her husband came to an end
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀의 남편을 위해 슬피 우는 시간이 끝났다

sentences.original_text: Then David sent some of his men
to bring her to his palace
Later, she gave birth to a son
But the Lord was not pleased with David
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 주님은 다윗을 기쁘게 여기지 않았다
